meanings.definition: To produce saliva in anticipation of food
meanings.sent1: The dog was salivating as it waited for its dinner.
meanings.sent2: I start salivating whenever I smell freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent3: The thought of pizza had him salivating like a hungry bear.
meanings.sent4: The chef's delicious cooking always leaves me salivating for more.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the juicy burger had my mouth salivating uncontrollably.

meanings.definition: To show great interest or desire in something
meanings.sent1: She was salivating over the latest fashion trends in the magazine.
meanings.sent2: The kids were salivating at the thought of going to the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: He was salivating over the new video game release like a kid in a candy store.
meanings.sent4: The team was salivating at the opportunity to compete in the championship.
meanings.sent5: The audience was salivating for the singer to start the concert.
